text: @WhiteHouse RACIST @realDonaldTrump 85000 deaths from Coronavirus and Trump prefers to play basketball, football and..     maybe play at golf? (We know, he cheats; but then, the cheats at everything......  golf, his wives...). This November elect a real president. DUMP TRUMP
